descriptor: M thinks her nephew Ben doesn't love her because he cries every time he's around her
theme song
J and C taunt M with a basketball
R eats a kiwi pie, but he is allergic
M and R go to the hospital and leave Ben in the hands of J and C
transition
Pb composes a song and sings it to Ra
Ra's boss asks her to tell Pb that he found someone else to sing at his cafe
transition
J w C walks with Ben to attract women
the woman thinks J w C adopted a baby together
Ra arranges for Pb to sing tonight, but Pb refuses because she won't be paid like the other person
Pb sings on the sidewalk of the coffee shop
transition
R is afraid of needles...
the doctor gives him an injection + R shakes M's hand too hard !
transition
C wants to go home, but J spots two women and decides to follow them on the bus
J offers them to go have a drink together
they all disembark at the same bus stop
...but forgets Ben on the bus
J w C run to the bus to find Ben, but fail
M had an x-ray for her hand, but everything is ok
